name: Cube Blast: Clear Up Joy Fast
name_original: Cube Blast: Clear Up Joy Fast
description:
This is an addictive puzzle game!

Match the blocks of the same color and combine rocket for big explosions to through challenging levels! Download it now for free! Internet is not necessary for Cubes Blast. Join the finest adventure of your life, it feels so great, you will like it.

FEATURES:
- Easy and fun, but challenging to play.
- Play anytime without internet & wifi.
- Unique and simple gameplay, relax your brain.
